title: Democratic debate: Joe Biden accidentally refers to Bernie Sanders as 'the president' in heated exchange
text:
Joe Biden accidentally referred to fellow Democrat Bernie Sanders as "the president", as the two septuagenarians clashed during the debate in Houston.

As the two men, along with Elizabeth Warren, argued about their various plans for reforming America’s healthcare system, the former vice president incorrectly referred to Mr Sanders.

He quickly corrected himself, saying: “My friend from Vermont.”

As the two men, along with Elizabeth Warren, argued about their various plans for reforming America’s healthcare system, the former vice president incorrectly referred to Mr Sanders.
